definition: history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: The historic rivalries of Ivy League universities in the United States have reached the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 美國常青藤聯盟大學的歷史性競爭演繹到了互聯網上。

sentences.english: Cooperation between China and SAARC thus faces a historical opportunity. China is South Asia's biggest neighbor.
sentences.chinese: 中國與南盟合作面臨着歷史性機遇。

sentences.english: The "Tong Dian" of Du you is a historic cultural establishments system political book.
sentences.chinese: 杜佑《通典》是一部歷史性典章制度政書。

sentences.english: Concomitant with the historic changes in China are the new development and changes in the whole world. How should we read the changes our world has gone through in the past decade?
sentences.chinese: 中國的歷史性變化是與世界的發展變化相伴生的。

sentences.english: The precise date of the birth and historicity of Jesus are much debated.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌出生的準確日子和歷史性的耶穌有着很多的爭議。

sentences.english: And both of them are very historical, but the East Side is very wealthy
sentences.chinese: 兩個地區都很有歷史性，但上東區非常富裕。

sentences.english: Several other architectural monuments in the city havelikewise been rebuilt.( DPA)
sentences.chinese: 這座城市的其他一些歷史性建築也已經完成重建。

sentences.english: Coal tar has been a historic contribution to modern organic chemical industry.
sentences.chinese: 煤焦油曾爲近代有機化工作出了歷史性貢獻。

sentences.english: Regrettably, mental disorders were not included in this historic dialogue.
sentences.chinese: 遺憾的是，精神障礙並不包括在這一歷史性的議題中。

sentences.english: It is hoped that this quasi-historical review of the development of the subject will be made.
sentences.chinese: 我們希望對這一學科的發展作半歷史性的評論。

sentences.english: Sima Qian visualized this feat as blazing the path into the west regions.
sentences.chinese: 司馬遷把這一歷史性的壯舉形象地描繪爲“鑿空”。

sentences.english: The scarab image was used for recording historical events.
sentences.chinese: 聖甲蟲像用於記錄歷史性事件。

sentences.english: Yes, there will be historical and personal traces of lives lived in SoG .
sentences.chinese: 是的，會有歷史性的和個人的遺蹟。

sentences.english: Chinese supermodel Liu Wen is still in shock over her history-making rise to fame.
sentences.chinese: 中國超級名模劉雯仍然其名氣的歷史性上升而震驚。

sentences.english: Bridging the urban-rural gap in China is a historic task.
sentences.chinese: 縮小中國城鄉差距是一項歷史性的任務。

definition: (Tw) to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
